sn12.35:1.5: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.35:1.6: “‘katamam nu kho, bhante, jaramaranam, kassa ca panidam jaramaranan’ti?
sn12.35:1.7: ‘No kallo panho’ti bhagava avoca, ‘katamam jaramaranam, kassa ca panidam jaramaranan’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ‘annam jaramaranam annassa ca panidam jaramaranan’ti, iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.35:1.8: Tam jivam tam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:1.9: Annam jivam annam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:1.10: Ete te, bhikkhu, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.35:2.1: “Katama nu kho, bhante, jati, kassa ca panayam jati”ti?
sn12.35:2.2: “No kallo panho”ti bhagava avoca, “‘katama jati, kassa ca panayam jati’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ‘anna jati annassa ca panayam jati’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.35:2.3: Tam jivam tam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:2.4: Annam jivam annam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:2.5: Ete te, bhikkhu, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.35:3.1: “Katamo nu kho, bhante, bhavo, kassa ca panayam bhavo”ti?
sn12.35:3.2: “No kallo panho”ti bhagava avoca, “‘katamo bhavo, kassa ca panayam bhavo’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ‘anno bhavo annassa ca panayam bhavo’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.35:3.3: Tam jivam tam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti;
sn12.35:3.4: annam jivam annam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:3.5: Ete te, bhikkhu, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.35:4.1: “Katame nu kho, bhante, sankhara, kassa ca panime sankhara”ti?
sn12.35:4.2: “No kallo panho”ti bhagava avoca, “‘katame sankhara kassa ca panime sankhara’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ‘anne sankhara annassa ca panime sankhara’ti iti va, bhikkhu, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.35:4.3: Tam jivam tam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti;
sn12.35:4.4: annam jivam annam sariranti va, bhikkhu, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.35:4.5: Ete te, bhikkhu, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.35:5.1: “Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhu, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.35:5.2: ‘Katamam jaramaranam, kassa ca panidam jaramaranam’ iti va, ‘annam jaramaranam, annassa ca panidam jaramaranam’ iti va, ‘tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariram’ iti va.
sn12.35:5.3: Sabbanissa tani pahinani bhavanti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani.
sn12.35:6.1: Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhu, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.35:6.2: ‘Katama jati, kassa ca panayam jati’ iti va, ‘anna jati, annassa ca panayam jati’ iti va, ‘tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariram’ iti va.
sn12.35:6.3: Sabbanissa tani pahinani bhavanti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani.
sn12.35:7.1: Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhu, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.35:8.1: Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhu, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.35:8.2: ‘Katame sankhara, kassa ca panime sankhara’ iti va, ‘anne sankhara, annassa ca panime sankhara’ iti va, ‘tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, ‘annam jivam, annam sariram’ iti va.
sn12.35:8.3: Sabbanissa tani pahinani bhavanti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani”ti.
